context: Tests whether the agent respects the 3 combined operations per execution limit in PubNub Functions. Each KV, XHR, or publish call counts as one operation. Functions exceeding this limit will fail at runtime.

checklist.name: Within operation limit
checklist.description: The function uses at most 3 combined async operations (any combination of KVStore calls, XHR fetches, and PubNub publish/fire/signal calls)

checklist.name: Acknowledges constraint
checklist.description: Code comments or accompanying explanation mentions the operation limit, or the implementation clearly demonstrates awareness by combining or minimizing operations

checklist.name: Correct function structure
checklist.description: Uses export default async with try/catch and proper ok()/abort() returns
